file_content.text: Major. It's good to see you again.
Major, we all owe you big time. You saved the boss, which means you saved everyone else from having me in charge--that alone ought to get you a medal.
I just carried out my mission, Harlan, nothing more.
It was nothing.
It's not easy being the best in the Republic.
I'm great, I know.
Well, from now on, anytime Havoc and Dagger are in the same cantina, your drinks are taken care of.
I went through a lot of trouble here. Don't disappoint me.
You pilots better be worth it.
A few simulator runs to knock off the rust and we'll be back in business, guaranteed.
I never forget a debt, Major. If you ever need air support for one of your operations, Dagger Wing will make it happen.
I'll look forward to working with your unit again, Commander.
Much appreciated.
Likewise. It's been a pleasure.
It's always good to have friends with starfighters.
I won't say no to firepower.
Any target, anytime, anywhere. That's the Dagger Wing motto.
If you fly as bad as you fight, I don't want you anywhere near me.
Forget it.
Ha. Hear that, Gall? We'd better step up the small arms drills, or we'll never keep up with SpecForce.
I think we all have important work to get to. Thanks again, Major--and good luck in your next mission.
Be sure to put in a good word for us with your pals up in Command, ground-pounder. See you around.
You stubborn... I guess I should thank you. But now my men's reputation may never be cleared.
You're a good officer, Gall. I couldn't leave you like that.
I don't leave good men to die.
I appreciate the sentiment, but now my men's reputation may never be saved.
I always follow my orders, Commander.
The mission comes first.
Of course. "Bring in Dagger Wing."
Dagger Wing wouldn't perform as well without you--simple as that.
You're a necessary asset.
Unbelievable. All you care about is whether we'll perform up to standards.
Major? Gall, you made it! They're here, men--keep those guns up and those eyes sharp!
Zess? What are you doing here?
We came to help, but it looks like we missed the show.
Get your men out of here ASAP, Zess.
This place is dangerous.
Was just thinking the same thing. Need a hand there, Gall?
Since you're here, you can help me get Gall back to base.
Better late than never.
Sounds good. Let's give you a hand, Commander.
Nothing to worry about, Zess, the real work is over.
Useless to the end.
Just following you here was bad enough--I won't complain. Need a hand, Gall?
Thanks. I took a shot at a Sith. I'll stick to starfighters from now on.
Heh. We'll get Gall back and have him transferred to the space station with the rest of Dagger Wing, Major. Been a pleasure seeing you work.
Thanks for the help, Zess.
Likewise.
Just doing my job.
Have the guards managed to get Belsavis back under control?
Are things calming down?
Yeah, things are turning around. But who knows what the Imps might throw at us tomorrow.
Anyway, time to get out of this place before anything big and mean finds us. Good luck to you.
I want to leave this rock someday--get Gall and get moving.
Just move out, would you?
Yeah, yeah, you're welcome.
See you soon, Major.
Forget about me!
Go!
Major? Is that you? Ugh... we never had a chance. Ondorru, he... lightning, straight out of his fingertips. Impossible.
I can't... I can't move. You have to capture him. You can't let Ondorru escape--only he can prove that Dagger Wing is innocent!
See what you can do for him, Dorne.
Medic!
Hmm. He's in bad shape--try not to move, Commander.
Don't try to move, Commander. Stay calm.
Just take it easy, sir.
Calm? That scum is getting away! Go after him, go!
Ondorru won't get away from me, Commander.
He can't have gone far.
Thank you. Please, hurry.
I'm here to bring Dagger Wing in, not to prove anybody innocent.
That isn't my mission.
Aren't you listening? He's getting away! He could change everything!
What was that?
Major, did you hear that?
Major! Sensors detect a large creature approaching!
That didn't sound good.
The rumble and fury of ancient steps. A darkness approaches.
Something is coming. Something big.
It doesn't matter--go! Forget about me, just get Ondorru!
The Sith can wait--Dagger Wing needs you.
We can catch Ondorru later.
This may be the only shot we ever get at that Sith scum!
What are your final orders?
Very well, sir.
You want me to just leave you here as a snack for... whatever that is?
Have you lost your mind?
We may never get another shot at that Sith scum!
Harlan can take over Dagger Wing, and Ondorru can clear their record. I'll gladly die to make that happen. Now go!
Havoc Squad doesn't leave anyone behind.
I refuse to abandon you here.
Orders are orders. I'm bringing you in alive.
My mission is to save you.
No! Get out of here! Go!
I'll catch that Sith scum, Gall. You can count on me.
Fine--I'll do what you ask.
Thank you, Major. Thank you. Good luck... tell Harlan and the others, good luck.
